Student Visa Renewal Process in Vienna üá¶üáπ

Published: Mar 19, 2025 |  at  05:06 AM
| Suggest Changes

üìÖ Appointment Booking

To renew your student residence permit, you need to book an appointment with MA35.
‚û°Ô∏è Click here to book your appointment and select the correct branch based on your district of residence.

üìÑ Required Documents

  1. Application Form (Antrag):

    • ‚û°Ô∏è German Form (DE)
    • ‚û°Ô∏è English Form (EN)

  2. Passport & Photos:

    • Original passport and a copy
    • Four color passport photos (size 3.5 √ó 4.5 cm)

  3. Accommodation Proof:

    • Valid accommodation contract
    • Last 3 months‚Äô rent payment slips
    • Meldezettel (official address registration)

  4. Proof of Funds (Bank Statement):
    According to MA35, you must show that you have the financial means to support your stay:

    • Single person: ‚Ç¨1,217.96/month
    • Couple: ‚Ç¨1,921.46/month
    • Each child: +‚Ç¨187.93/month

    üí° If you work legally (up to 20h/week) with AMS permission and earn ‚Ç¨500+/month, you may not need to show full bank funds for the entire year. Instead, submit:

    • AMS work approval (Anzeigebest√§tigung)
    • Salary slips for the last 3 months

    ‚úÖ However, for safety, it‚Äôs still recommended to have ‚Ç¨3,000‚Äì‚Ç¨5,000 in your bank account.

  5. Health Insurance:
    Valid Austrian health insurance (√ñGK or private)

  6. Study Documents (combine all in one folder):

    • Studienbest√§tigung (Enrollment certificate)
    • Studienbuchblatt (Latest academic record)
    • Proof of academic progress (8 semester hours or 16 ECTS per academic year)

  7. Financial/Legal Report:

    • Credit report (KSV): Request here
